alert.note: Alert for Adams (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued April 05 at 1:18PM EDT until April 05 at 1:45PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Northern Adams County in northeastern Indiana... * Until 145 PM EDT. * At 118 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Bluffton, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Monroe around 130 PM EDT. Decatur around 135 PM EDT. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
